channel.title: New Humble Bunle - Introversion!!!
channel.description:
There´s a new HB going on, and this time round it´s introversión, any of their games is well worth the average price and then some. Included are Darwinia, Multiwinia, Defcon and Uplink.
Paying the average (just over 3 dollars right now) you also get crayon physics deluxe and aquaria.

item.title: New Humble Bunle - Introversion!!!
item.dc:creator: Luciel
item.description:
I´d sware I put it in the tech & gaming forum o.O ah well

crayon pd is fun, never tried aquaria, I already had uplink and defcon but never got round to darwinia so gave 4usd

Read full topic

item.title: New Humble Bunle - Introversion!!!
item.dc:creator: BahamutBBob
item.description:
I already have all of the Introversion games (minus Multiwinia, don’t really care one way or the other about it) so I need an opinion on Crayon Physics and Aquaria. Yes or no to those two?

Read full topic

item.title: New Humble Bunle - Introversion!!!
item.dc:creator: geekofalltrades
item.description:
In the Show Off forum? lol…

Anyway, I’ve already got Crayon Physics Deluxe, so I was thinking of just buying this bundle for a quarter or so. There have been so many lately, it seems like; didn’t they used to be once-a-year?

Read full topic
